about.me: I am Antonis, a software engineer. I have been developing, deploying, maintaining and managing large production systems for the last 15 years. Cardano's research, development and applied methodologies have sparked my interest since 2016, and I have been following ever since. This pool is a first step in getting involved and contributing to this project and its community.
about.server: Relays and BP nodes running on dedicated servers on AWS
about.company: Y-DEV was founded late 2011, as a personal company to work on software development contracts. The renewed vision is to grow and evolve around the Cardano ecosystem and community, with a focus on smart contract development.
